GetDatabaseData Request¶

GET /Database¶

This post request returns database connection data (except password)

Example request:

GET /Database HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Accept: application/json
Request Headers

  • admin_token – Admin token.

Query Parameters

  • local_database_name – Local name of a database.

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

[
  {
      "status": "success",
      "ip": "localhost",
      "port": "1234",
      "username": "user",
      "local_name": "local_database_name"
  }
]
Status Codes

  • 200 OK – No errors.

  • 403 Forbidden – Access denied. Check admin token in a header.

  • 400 Bad Request – Bad request. Check request body.

  • 404 Not Found – Database not found
